attributes.action: discourage small business from investing their capital with UK banks that do not gurantee they (the banks) will not unilaterally end the lending contract if the small business is not at fault.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The banks in UK in last 24 months or so have pulled out of lending contracts with small business without the business having defaulted on the terms of the contract.  Many small business have been decimated as a result.  The government should make it illegal for banks to behave in this manner.
